settings.liquid:
<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    var paymentIcons = document.querySelectorAll('.h-stack.gap-2.wrap.justify-center svg');
    
    paymentIcons.forEach(function(icon) {
        var title = icon.querySelector('title').textContent;
        if (title !== 'American Express' && title !== 'Apple Pay' && title !== 'Klarna' && title !== 'Mastercard' && title !== 'PayPal') {
            icon.style.display = 'none';
        }
    });
});
</script>

<!-- Begin eTrusted widget tag -->
<etrusted-widget data-etrusted-widget-id="wdg-b3a04c8a-6d06-4cab-8378-42502212ea6f"></etrusted-widget>
<!-- End eTrusted widget tag -->
